summary:
Cricket is a popular sport played by two teams of 11 players each. The game is played on a large field with a rectangular pitch in the middle. The aim is to score runs by hitting a ball with a bat and running between two sets of wickets. Players can also get opponents 'out' by hitting the wickets with the ball or catching the hit ball before it bounces.

The sport originated in England in the 16th century and spread worldwide with the British Empire. Today, it is most popular in South Asia, Australia, and the UK. There are different formats, from traditional five-day Test matches to the faster-paced Twenty20.
title: Cricket
